TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_szy_malimad, title = malimad, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Sakizaya]}, url = {https://szy.wikipedia.org/wiki/malimad} }

S.FORM: (kamu nu hulam:被遷移；被搬) malimad tuway kiya padekuwan. 那家醫院已遷移了. malimad tu kaku i Linahem. . matenes tu malimad ci Tubah ta Pusung. Tubah搬到臺東很久了.
(kamo no holam:被遷移；被搬) malimad toway kiya padekowan. 那家醫院已遷移了. malimad to kako i Linahem. . matenes to malimad ci Tobah ta Posong. Tobah搬到臺東很久了.
